meta.name: Vintage: Overview-Template
meta.description: template created from dashboard: Vintage: Overview

attributes.name: Vintage: Overview
attributes.description: Listening activity, BPM, energy, and top songs and artists

properties.description: Track listening activity throughout the day.

queries.text:
from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "track")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "seconds_played")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "artist_name", "track_name"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value / 60 }))

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "track")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "tempo")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last)

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "track")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "seconds_played")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "artist_name", "track_name"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value / 60 }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: sum, createEmpty: true)
  |> cumulativeSum(columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "track")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "energy")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last)

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "tempo")
  |> group()
  |> mean()

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "energy")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value * 100.00 }))
  |> group()
  |> mean()

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "seconds_played")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "artist_name", "track_name"])
  |> sum()
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement"], mode:"by")
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: string(v: duration(v: r._value * 1000000000)) }))

from(bucket: "kyle.ayn")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "track")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "seconds_played")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "artist_name"])
  |> sum()
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: string(v: duration(v: r._value * 1000000000 )) }))

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "track")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "seconds_played")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "artist_genre"])
  |> sum()
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: string(v: duration(v: r._value * 1000000000 )) }))
